content: Replace call_extras_discover_format() with direct TypeSchemaEngine usage in discovery_context.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after replacing discovery method
Update enrich_with_type_registry() to call new TypeSchemaEngine method
Update find_type_in_type_schema() to work with TypeSchemaResponse structure
Fix any clippy issues following warning rules
Update enrich_from_type_schema() to work directly with TypeInfo structure
Update extract_examples_from_type_schema() to handle TypeInfo.spawn_format field
Update extract_mutation_paths_from_type_schema() to handle MutationPathInfo objects
Update extract_enum_info_from_type_schema() to handle structured enum_info
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after unified_types updates
Add necessary imports for TypeSchemaEngine and related types
Run cargo nextest run to validate changes
STOP if test failures - review with user
STOP and return control for code review
